artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Kakumotoya Kinjirō
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 17; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 306.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: male figure looking L, holding sword in teeth; black streaks in foreground partially obscuring figure's body and bushy black hair
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
text: Related to the play Kagamiyama gonichi no Iwafuji加賀見山再岩藤, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 3rd month of 1860.
title: Actor Ichikawa Kodanji IV as Torii Matasuke
